headline: Aon (AON): Exploring Valuation After Strong Q3 Results and Upbeat Outlook
summary: Aon (AON) delivered a third quarter update that caught investors’ attention, as both sales and earnings surpassed expectations. Management reinforced their outlook, pointing to momentum in core risk and reinsurance solutions. See our latest analysis for Aon. Aon’s latest earnings beat and ongoing strategic moves have helped the share price rebound from its recent lows, finishing at $346.32 after a 1.9% jump in the last trading day. While the 1-year total shareholder return stands at -9%, the...
